Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6923 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6923 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package tensorflow is earlier than 2.16.1-9, affected by CVE-2024-6923
